channel.title: Please help -Crazypig12
channel.description: Hello, My name is Crazypig12 on the server moparcraft. I used to play on an account that was not bought on the site of minecraft. Therefore it was not a premium account. I have tried to use my name Crazypig12 once to register with your site to be able to play on your server but when i did it i forgot the password that i use when im logged into the server the "/login <password>' one but i have forgot the password. I remember the password for this site but it is not the same as the one on the game. Please get back so i can play on your server. It is a very well made server.

item.title: Please help -Crazypig12
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:6, topic:444256”][quote author=omgilikepie link=topic=546947.msg4009872#msg4009872 date=1339059003]
First things first, this is not an infraction report, so try and find the right place to post next time.

Aside from that…

If you know your forum password then you can go into your profile and change your in game password.
[/quote]

First things first? that’t cute…[/quote]

omgilikepie:

random post? That’s cute…

Stop it queers.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help -Crazypig12
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

That would suggest that somebody else has played on the server with this account. Unfortunately, if you have a hacked version of the minecraft client, you will have to change your name. If you don’t, one can be found in this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help -Crazypig12
item.dc:creator: @chandlerksymonds1 chandlerksymonds1
item.description:
@chandlerksymonds1 wrote:

But thing IS that when i try to modify my account so that it will change the password for crazypig12 it says “The name crazypig12 has already been registered with moparcraft” but i have never played on this server with this account…

Read full topic
